Name: Magic gems
About the game: Magic stones will allow you to enter the Sultan's treasury and see all of his untold treasures. An unusual version of the gameplay of the game 'three in a row' will surprise the fan of the genre, because here you need to break the combo of gems yourself, trying to spend as few moves on it as possible and fulfill the goal of the level. Even a sophisticated player will have a hard time - the difficulty of the game will increase with each level. Will you cope with all the tasks and complete all the levels? Features: - Unusual gameplay - Nice graphics - Achievements - Nice soundtrack
